answers.answer: Also to add to my symptomsNightmares!! (bad)Thirsty ( only cause I per to much)AniextyStomach feel hot on the inside.
Hello,go see a dr and get tested to rule out diabetes.Best wishes.

A CBC will not tell anything about diabetes. A CBC is a Complete Blood Count. You need a fasting blood sugar, HA1C and a CMP, Complete Metabolic Panel.  Many of the symptoms you describe go with diabetes you should be checked as soon as possible. Untreated high blood sugar levels can lead to death.

If I had diabetes would it show up on CBC TEST? My CBC was normal, my pap was normalnormal. Std test negative ( I have not done the HIV). I recently had a boil/cyst on my butt! I've never had that beforebefore! My stomach hurts!
